announce.message: Brace yourselves, warriors! The Apocalypse stirs in the lower mountains of Draken's eastern desert. Prepare for a cataclysmic challenge and untold treasures!!
Darkness looms as the Apocalypse awakens. Its malevolent presence grows in the lower mountains of Draken's eastern First Desert. Rally allies for the imminent cataclysmic confrontation!
Epic trial nears. Apocalypse strengthens. Unite for cataclysmic clash!
Last call! Apocalypse rises!You can use command /bosses to help you find it!! Battle chaos, seize rewards. Time for heroic legend!!
